alerts.message:
...Red flag warning remains in effect until 7 PM MST this
evening...
...Red flag warning remains in effect from 9 am to 7 PM MST
Sunday...

* area and timing...along and east of the Central Mountain chain
 through early evening today, and from mid morning until early
 evening on Sunday. The most widespread critical conditions will
 occur during the afternoon on Sunday. 

* 20 foot winds...southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts to around 40
 mph today. Southwest 25 to 40 mph with gusts between 50 and 60
 mph on Sunday, becoming west during the late afternoon. Highest
 gusts are expected across the northeast Highlands on Sunday.
 
* Relative humidity...minimum values ranging from around 7 to 15
 percent today, and 5 to 12 percent on Sunday. 

* Impacts...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. 
 Outdoor burning is not recommended. 

Precautionary/preparedness actions...

Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the
field of this red flag warning for Saturday.

Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the
field of this red flag warning for Sunday.
